title: About
storyStart: My coding journey began in 2020, after corona entered our lives and helped me redirect my professional career.

storyCurrent.intro: Since then I've been building my own projects, consulted for online shop owners, and collaborated with
storyCurrent.for: and create an AI-based solution for controlling carbon concentrations trends in soils and vegetation. Leading to

aboutMe.first: I'm a confident and capable individual, enjoy and profit from team work, curious by nature, and perpetually eager and work on improving my skills one problem at a time.
aboutMe.second: I love being alive, diving, camping and traveling in the outdoor, coffee under a tree with nice view, gardening, nature and animals in general, so many different kinds of sports, building and repairing stuff, reading, good music and films, and on top of all I love my wife and daughter.
aboutMe.third: I love reading code as well as code things from scratch, and enjoy very much bringing to life ideas on the browser.
